meanings: 실용회화-화났을 때 · 비난 다툼 등 How dare you say such a thing?
실용회화-화났을 때 · 비난 다툼 등 How can you!

vlive.korean: 자연 따위가 감히 날 괴롭혀? Is the nature bothering me? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] VOL.5 Ep.01 방찬 X 한
촬영하는데 감히 마스크를 써? How dare did he wear a mask? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이의 고민상담소 첫번째❣️
vlive.english: How dare did he wear a mask?

vlive.korean: 너 이 빛, 빛 너 이 자식 감히 날 깨워? You, the light, how dare you wake me up? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] VOL.5 Ep.01 방찬 X 한
vlive.english: You, the light, how dare you wake me up?

vlive.korean: 감히 누굴 나가 떨어지게 하려고 그렇죠? How is she trying to distance the couple? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [엑시] 나 보고싶었지?
vlive.english: How is she trying to distance the couple?

vlive.korean: 너무 잘해서 내가 감히 따라할 수 없겠는데? You're so amazing that I can't catch it up. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.20
vlive.english: You're so amazing that I can't catch it up.

examples.korean: ‘How dare she,’ he muttered under his breath. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그녀가 감히 어떻게,” 그가 숨죽인 소리로 중얼거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘How dare she,’ he muttered under his breath. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: How dare you talk to me like that? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어떻게 감히 네가 나한테 그런 말을 해? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How dare you talk to me like that? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They daren’t ask for any more money. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 감히 돈을 조금이라도 더 달라고 하지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They daren’t ask for any more money. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She hardly dared to venture an opinion. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 감히 의견을 말할 엄두를 거의 내지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She hardly dared to venture an opinion. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He didn’t dare (to) say what he thought. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 감히 자기 생각을 말할 용기가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He didn’t dare (to) say what he thought. Add to Wordbook
